oppression.question: Did I through my words, actions, or attitudes, mistreat others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Have I taken for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the good things in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my own talents, skills, and achievements, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking words that were unbecoming or hurtful to others
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in speaking words that were unbecoming or hurtful to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in public settings, using language that is unbecoming of a Christian?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when speaking to others using language that lacked respect for their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to neglecting my body 's needs or compromising my physical and spiritual well - being
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it led to neglecting my body's needs or compromising my physical and spiritual well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, often leading to unhealthy habits and neglecting my body's true needs?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading me to prioritize fleeting pleasures over genuine well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over responsible financial stewardship and the needs of those who depend on me
of those who depend on me
prodigality.question: Have I allowed excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over responsible financial stewardship and the needs of those who depend on me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations or personal needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively indulged in wasteful gambling, prioritizing it over my financial obligations or personal needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
among friends at social gatherings or online communities
at social gatherings or online communities
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, especially when doing so among friends at social gatherings or online communities?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you engage in any activity on Sunday that could have been avoided, compromising the Lord's day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: in my relationships , which has damaged my interactions with others
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage rather than seeking reconciliation in my relationships, which has damaged my interactions with others?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
